content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Greetings, dear tenant. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 650 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller

content: Well, that's quite an interesting offer. I'll have to consider it. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or include in our negotiations?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all for now. I expect your final answer soon. Thank you.
TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, but I'm afraid I cannot accept your offer of 650 Euro per month at this time. I will need to consider other options and negotiate further to achieve the best possible rental price for myself.
name: Heinrich Heine
